short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save notes and webpage information as private gists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This allows you to save a note to your private gists on GitHub. If you are on a webpage and highlight certain text, it will pre-populate your note with that text.
